channel.title: Phone Companies on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Companies on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Let's Dial Up the Weirdness
item.description: Today in Tedium: NYNEX hasn’t been a going concern since Smash Mouth was first telling us to walk on the sun. (You might know it under its current post-merger name, Verizon.) But that didn’t stop me last night from dialing up a message on my Google Hangouts window with an automated request from a NYNEX operator that I deposit five cents or my phone call will be terminated. (Couldn’t do it.
